Apple CEO Tim Cook said Donald Trump 's trade tariffs [V: will] be ' lose / lose , ' adding that eschewing protectionism is key to economic prosperity . The US president is yet to agree on common ground with China over trade , while last week it slapped tariffs on imports from the EU , Canada , and Mexico .
